mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.REGISTER_ADVISER as registerAdviser, a.REGISTER_COUNTRY as registerCountry, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , REGISTER_ADVISER , REGISTER_COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{registerAdviser} , #{registerCountry} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
REGISTER_ADVISER ,
REGISTER_COUNTRY ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{registerAdviser} ,
#{registerCountry} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
REGISTER_ADVISER = #{registerAdviser} ,
REGISTER_COUNTRY = #{registerCountry} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , REGISTER_ADVISER , REGISTER_COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.registerAdviser} , #{item.registerCountry} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , REGISTER_ADVISER = #{item.registerAdviser} , REGISTER_COUNTRY = #{item.registerCountry} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , REGISTER_ADVISER = #{registerAdviser} , REGISTER_COUNTRY = #{registerCountry} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_PERMISSION a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
